template.name: AIX by Zabbix agent
template.description:
It is an official AIX template. It requires Zabbix agent 6.0 or newer.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/
Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

item.name: AIX: Host name of Zabbix agent running
AIX: Zabbix agent ping
item.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for the availability check.

item.name: AIX: Version of Zabbix agent running
AIX: Number of running processes
item.description: The number of processes in a running state.

item.name: AIX: Number of processes
item.description: The total number of processes in any state.

item.name: AIX: Processor load (1 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as the system CPU load divided by the number of CPU cores.

trigger.name: AIX: Processor load is too high

item.name: AIX: Processor load (5 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as the system CPU load divided by the number of CPU cores.

item.name: AIX: Processor load (15 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as the system CPU load divided by the number of CPU cores.

item.name: AIX: Host name
item.description: A host name of the system.

trigger.expression: last(/AIX by Zabbix agent/system.hostname,#1)<>last(/AIX by Zabbix agent/system.hostname,#2)
trigger.name: AIX: Hostname was changed

item.name: AIX: CPU available physical processors in the shared pool
AIX: CPU number of physical processors consumed

trigger.name: AIX: Disk I/O is overloaded
trigger.description: The OS spends significant time waiting for the I/O (input/output) operations. It could be an indicator of performance issues with the storage system.

item.name: AIX: Processor units is entitled to receive
AIX: Length of the swap queue
AIX: Length of the run queue
AIX: Pages paged in from paging space
AIX: Pages paged out to paging space
AIX: Pages scanned by page-replacement algorithm
AIX: System information
item.description: The information as normally returned by the 'uname -a'.

trigger.expression: last(/AIX by Zabbix agent/system.uname,#1)<>last(/AIX by Zabbix agent/system.uname,#2)
trigger.name: AIX: Host information was changed
AIX: Server has just been restarted

item.name: AIX: Number of logged in users
item.description: The number of users who are currently logged in.

item.name: AIX: Available memory
item.description: The available memory is defined as free+cached+buffers memory.

trigger.name: AIX: Lack of available memory on server

item.name: AIX: Zabbix agent availability
item.description: Monitoring the availability status of the agent.

trigger.name: AIX: Zabbix agent is not available
trigger.description: For passive checks only the availability of the agent(s) and a host is used with {$AGENT.TIMEOUT} as the time threshold.

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: The discovery of network interfaces as defined in the global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: The discovery of different types of file systems as defined in the global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger_prototype.name: {#FSNAME}: Free disk space is less than 20%

override.name: Skip metadata collection for dynamic FS

macro.description: The timeout after which agent is considered unavailable. It works only for the agents reachable from Zabbix server/proxy (in passive mode).
